subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Brian Campbell and Maxim Afinogenov scored 4 minutes apart in the third period, lifting the Buffalo Sabres to a 6-3 victory over the visiting Boston Bruins Wednesday night.
snippet: Brian Campbell and Maxim Afinogenov scored 4 minutes apart in the third period, lifting the Buffalo Sabres to a 6-3 victory over the visiting Boston Bruins Wednesday night.
